name: favoro
title: FAVORO
description: Access your FAVORO bookmarks directly from Raycast, even faster
author: andworksGmbH

commands.name: search-favoro
commands.title: Search FAVORO
commands.subtitle: Search FAVORO bookmarks
commands.description: Search and access your FAVORO bookmarks

commands.name: open-favoro
commands.title: Open FAVORO
commands.subtitle: Open FAVORO web app
commands.description: Open the FAVORO web application in your browser

commands.name: logout-favoro
commands.title: Logout from FAVORO
commands.subtitle: Disconnect your FAVORO account
commands.description: Disconnect from FAVORO and clear all cached data

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
